title: Understanding the mechanisms of green tea EGCG against amyloid β oligomer neurotoxicity through computational studies
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,22525-22539
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03343D, Paper
Open Access
  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Priscila Baltazar Gonçalves, Yraima Cordeiro, Ana Carolina Rennó Sodero
EGCG and EC bind to the same sites on AβOs. However, EGCG forms H-bond and π-interactions with key residues more efficiently, leading to drastic remodeling that results in full detoxification of AβOs, while EC only partially detoxifies the AβOs.
